content.query:
USE nyc_taxi_discovery;

SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/calendar.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0', HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS cal;

EXEC sp_describe_first_result_set N'SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK ''abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/calendar.csv'',
        FORMAT = ''CSV'', HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = ''2.0''
    ) AS cal'


SELECT *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'abfss://nyc-taxi-data@synapsecoursedlshreyas.dfs.core.windows.net/raw/calendar.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV', HEADER_ROW = TRUE,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0'
    ) WITH(
        date_key INT,
        date date,
        year SMALLINT,
        month TINYINT,
        day TINYINT,
        day_name VARCHAR(10),
        day_of_year SMALLINT,
        week_of_month TINYINT,
        week_of_year TINYINT,
        month_name VARCHAR(10),
        year_month INT,
        year_week INT
    )
     AS cal;
